structure.unit: ARTICLE CXXVII. WEST PERRINE COMMUNITY REDEVELOPMENT AND REVITALIZATION TRUST FUND

text.section: Notwithstanding the provisions of herein, the County's obligation to fund the Fund annually shall continue until all loans, advances and indebtedness, if any, and interest thereon, of the Agency incurred as a result of redevelopment in the Redevelopment Area have been paid.
